naslov: Stambeno poslovna zgrada 6 stanova - Prenamjena u Hotel sa **** Seget (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji Stambeno-poslovne zgrade 1387m2 koja je izgrađena (završeni građevinski radovi). Ona se sastoji od PO+PR+2kata. Po projektu su u prizemlju i na 1. katu poslovni prostori, a na 2 katu 6 stanova(uk.334m2). Parcela je veličine 1400m2. Ishodovana je nova građevinska dozvola za prenamjenu ovog objekta u luksuzni hotel sa 4 zvjezdice na ukupno 5 etaža ukupne površine 1779m2 sa 34 smještajnih jedinica, restoranom i parkingom. Postoji idejni projekt sa svom ostalom dokumentacijom za prenamjenu. Nekretnina se nalazi izuzetno atraktivnoj lokaciji 200m od mora. Za detaljniji uvid u dokumentaciju i razgled nekretnine obratite se u agenciju. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Residential and commercial building with 6 apartments - Conversion into Hotel with **** Seget We mediate in the sale of a residential and commercial building of 1387m2 that has been built (completed construction works). It consists of ground floor + ground floor + 2 floors. According to the project, there are business premises on the ground floor and on the 1st floor, and 6 apartments on the 2nd floor (incl. 334m2). The plot is 1400m2 in size. A new building permit was issued for the conversion of this building into a luxury hotel with 4 stars on a total of 5 floors with a total area of 1779m2 with 34 accommodation units, a restaurant and a parking lot. There is a conceptual project with all other documentation for conversion. The property is located in an extremely attractive location 200m from the sea. For a more detailed insight into the documentation and a tour of the property, please contact the agency. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: 00385915615115 ŽELJANA
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
